response.overview: Watch them fuck. It goes without saying that you won't see the guy's faces in this POV-style bonanza from Maximum Desire, but we've a sneaking suspicion that you won't be too bothered. What you will see of them, of course, is their oversized dongs; and, perhaps more importantly, you'll get to enjoy every last moment of mischief as the gorgeous but shameless sluts that are teamed up with them get to savour every last inch of throbbing man-flesh. Indeed, it's no time at all before each and every one of these brazen beauties are sucking on dick like their lives depended on it; before riding it in their pussies like the slags they were always destined to be. All neatly topped off by a cascade of man-brew that gets splattered in every direction!
response.title: POV Bitches
